JobFullDesc: Cloud Continuous Improvement Lead Do you want to be at the forefront of Deloittes growing Cloud practice? Were looking for exceptional leaders to help address our clients most complex Cloud challenges. You will work alongside top engineers and technical thought leaders to solve difficult problems in innovative ways, supporting our countrys most vital missions. Work youll do: Work with clients to understand and solve their most pressing business and technical challenges while leading a diverse talent group in support of Federal and State Government agencies. Develop trusted advisor relationships with clients technology leaders and help guide clients Cloud vision. Create new opportunities to showcase Cloud technologies and capabilities for our clients. Help lead our Cloud practice, develop our future Cloud leaders, and expand the Deloitte Cloud brand throughout the public sector marketplace. The team: Our Cloud Engineering team focuses on enabling our clients end-to-end journey from On-Premise to Cloud, with opportunities in the areas of: Cloud Strategy, Op Model Transformation, Cloud Development, Cloud Integration & APIs, Cloud Migration, Cloud Infrastructure & Engineering, and Cloud Managed Services. We help our clients see the transformational capabilities of Cloud as an opportunity for business enablement and competitive advantage. Cloud Engineering supports our clients by improving agility and resilience, while identifying opportunities to reduce IT operations spend through automation. We advance our clients toward a technology-driven future, leveraging vendor solutions and Deloitte-developed software products, tools, and accelerators, to achieve their vision. As a Consultant in our Practice you will: Responsible for delivering exceptional IT service, along with ensuring that customer incidents and service requests are completed within agreed Service Level Agreements (SLAs). Own the Information Technology Service Management (ITSM) policies and processes, including incident, change, request, and problem management and provide on-time ITSM internal and external reporting. Continue to mature and expand the value-add and drive down the cost of goods sold through continuous improvements within the Global Cloud Operations (GCO) Shared Services team. This includes maturing the GPS Pod and the GCO-GPS support model.
